title: Front Desk Officer Job at Daily Need Distributors Limited
content:
Daily Need Distributors Limited is a leading FMCG distributing company in West Africa covering 4 states in North Central Nigeria, with Head Office in Abuja, Nigeria. We have been delivering excellent values for over 25 years of existence. Our experience span through result driven partnerships with multinational, intercontinental and local organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location: Idu, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greeting and assisting clients and visitors professionally.
	Answering and routing incoming calls.
	Managing the reception area, ensuring it's organized and welcoming.
	Maintaining visitor logs and client records.
	Handling general inquiries and directing them to the appropriate personnel.
	Attending to customers' enquiries and complaints.


Requirements


	OND, HND, or Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Public Administration, Mass Communication, or a related field.
	1-3 years of experience in a similar role.
	Computer literacy is essential.
	Must be a mature, responsible, and well-mannered individual.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Female and single
	Fluentin Hausa
	Close proximity to Idu, Abuja.


Benefits


	Salary: N100,000 Gross/ Month.
	Annual leave allowance.
	Health Insurance Cover.
	Career development programs.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: recruitment@dndng.net using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Software Engineer Job at Choice Talents NG
content:
Choice Talents NG is Nigeria’s preferred talents management company. Our goal is to help build successful businesses through effective talent, resource and process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Software Engineer

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a software Engineer to build and maintain softwares, working on full lifecycle development, API integrations, and automation.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design, develop, and maintain secure, scalable web and mobile applications.
	Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party services (e.g., payment processors, authentication).
	Build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native, Flutter, or other frameworks.
	Collaborate with advisory teams to automate and digitize tax and audit processes.
	Maintain version control, document codebase, and ensure testing protocols.
	Monitor application performance and resolve bugs or performance bottlenecks.
	Support deployment to cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure).


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline.
	3+ years of experience in full stack development.
	Proficient in front-end technologies: React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
	Strong back-end skills: Node.js, C#, Python, PHP, or .NET.
	Solid experience in mobile app development (React Native or Flutter preferred).
	Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
	Experience with Git, CI/CD pipelines, and agile methodologies.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@choicetalents.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Human Resources & Recruitment Officer Job at Mactay Consulting
content:
Mactay Consulting, We are the leading management consulting firm in Nigeria, providing HR Consulting, Learning & Development Solutions, Outsourcing and Contact Centre Solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources & Recruitment Officer

Job Location: Lekki phase 1, Lagos

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Human Resources & Recruitment Officer to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the full recruitment process, handling payroll administration, growing our social media presence, and maintaining strong relationships with clients through regular visits and engagements.


Responsibilities
Recruitment & Onboarding:


	Manage end-to-end recruitment process including sourcing, interviewing, and onboarding of candidates
	Maintain and update job descriptions and specifications
	Conduct background checks and employment verifications


Payroll Management:


	Handle monthly payroll processing accurately and on time
	Maintain employee records related to salaries, benefits, and deductions
	Ensure compliance with tax laws and labor regulations


Social Media & Employer Branding:


	Develop and execute strategies to grow the company’s social media platforms (LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, etc.)
	Create engaging HR-related content and recruitment campaigns
	Promote job openings and company culture online


Client Relationship Management:


	Conduct regular visits to clients for feedback, engagement, and business development
	Serve as the primary HR contact for assigned client accounts
	Resolve client and candidate concerns professionally and promptly


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant HR and recruitment experience
	Proficient in payroll systems and HRIS software
	Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills
	Experience with social media marketing or brand management is an added advantage
	Ability to travel to client sites as required.


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 monthly.

title: Sales Representative Officer Job at Startup Soar
content:
Startup Soar is a leading business consulting and HR services provider, offering tailored solutions to businesses across all sectors. We empower organizations—from startups to established enterprises—with the tools, strategies, and expertise needed to optimize their human resources and business operations. Whether you’re building your dream business, growing your existing operations, or scaling to new heights, Startup Soar is your trusted partner in achieving sustained success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a skilled Sales Representative Officer to sell our real estate properties to potential clients.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for generating leads, building relationships with clients, and meeting sales targets.
	If you have excellent communication and negotiation skills, we encourage you to apply.


Responsibilities


	Generate leads and follow up on potential clients to sell real estate properties
	Conduct property viewings and presentations to showcase properties to clients
	Build and maintain relationships with clients to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty
	Stay up-to-date with market trends and competitor activity
	Collaborate with internal teams, including marketing and customer service, to achieve sales goals
	Negotiate prices and terms of sales with clients
	Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets
	Maintain accurate records of sales activities, including client interactions and sales progress.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
	1 - 3 years of experience in sales, preferably in real estate.
	Excellent communication.


Interpersonal skills:


	Ability to work under pressure and meet sales targets
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM software.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.
	Opportunity to work with a leading real estate development company
	Professional training and development programs
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment
	Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a compelling cover letter to: recruitmentconsult@zohomail.com using "Application for Sales Representative Officer" as the subject of the mail.
